metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3773 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s IP framework for transformingpackets (XFRM subsystem). This issue may allow a malicious user withCAP_NET_ADMIN privileges to cause a 4 byte out-of-bounds read ofXFRMA_MTIMER_THRESH when parsing netlink attributes, leading to potentialleakage of sensitive heap data to userspace.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
